title: [Vipershroud, Mossy Trail]
description: The trees press in even tighter, their canopies intertwining to produce a darkening tunnel effect, with little moonlight appearing through the vegetation overhead.  Speech echoes ominously, disturbing the forest's silence, and sweat runs in rivulets in the damp heat.  To the northeast, the trail appears to take a quick decline.

The trees press in even tighter, their canopies intertwining to produce a darkening tunnel effect, with small bits of sunlight appearing as stars through the vegetation overhead.  Speech echoes ominously, disturbing the forest's silence, and sweat runs in rivulets in the damp heat.  To the northeast, the trail appears to take a quick decline.
